alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Montgomery; Pike (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pike, southwestern Bullock and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Linwood, or 7 miles northeast of Troy, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Banks, Pine Level, Franklin Field, Beans Crossroads, Linwood, Shopton, Tanyard, High Ridge, Orion, Perote, Josie, China Grove, Sandfield, Currys and Simsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
